channel.title: CVE Feed for Bluetooth -- BR/EDR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bluetooth -- BR/EDR

item.title: CVE-2019-9506|2024-09-16T19:14:13.573Z -- bluetooth -- br%2Fedr
item.description: The Bluetooth BR/EDR specification up to and including version 5.1 permits sufficiently low encryption key length and does not prevent an attacker from influencing the key length negotiation. This allows practical brute-force attacks (aka "KNOB") that can decrypt traffic and inject arbitrary ciphertext without the victim noticing.
